DataElement.preferredName: Attitudes and Preferences Questionnaire Preference for Decision About Choosing a Treatment Score 5 Point Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Person's stated observation of their preference for the way to decide about choosing a treatment, using a five-point Likert scale.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

ValueDomain.preferredName: Attitudes and Preferences Questionnaire Treatment Choice Preference 5 Point Scale
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A five point ordered reference standard that describes a patient's preference for deciding and choosing a treatment using the Attitudes and Preferences Questionnaire.

PermissibleValues.value: I prefer to leave all decisions regarding my treatment to my doctor.
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Prefer to Leave All Decisions Regarding Treatment to My Doctor

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Prefer to Leave All Decisions Regarding Treatment to My Doctor
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual prefers to leave all decisions regarding treatment to their doctor.

Concepts.longName: Prefer to Leave All Decisions Regarding Treatment to My Doctor
Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual prefers to leave all decisions regarding treatment to their doctor.

PermissibleValues.value: I prefer that my doctor makes the final decision about which treatment will be used but seriously considers my opinion.
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Prefer My Doctor Makes Final Decision About Which Treatment is Used but Seriously Considers My Opinion

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Prefer My Doctor Makes Final Decision About Which Treatment is Used but Seriously Considers My Opinion
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual prefers that their doctor makes the final decision about which treatment will be used but seriously considers their opinion.

Concepts.longName: Prefer My Doctor Makes Final Decision About Which Treatment is Used but Seriously Considers My Opinion
Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual prefers that their doctor makes the final decision about which treatment will be used but seriously considers their opinion.

PermissibleValues.value: I prefer that my doctor and I share responsibility for deciding which treatment is best for me.
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Prefer My Doctor and I Share Responsibility for Deciding Which Treatment is Best

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Prefer My Doctor and I Share Responsibility for Deciding Which Treatment is Best
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual prefers that they and their doctor share responsibility for deciding which treatment is best for them.

Concepts.longName: Prefer My Doctor and I Share Responsibility for Deciding Which Treatment is Best
Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual prefers that they and their doctor share responsibility for deciding which treatment is best for them.

PermissibleValues.value: I prefer to make the final selection of my treatment after seriously considering my doctor's opinion.
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Prefer to Make Final Selection of My Treatment After Seriously Considering My Doctor's Opinion

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Prefer to Make Final Selection of My Treatment After Seriously Considering My Doctor's Opinion
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual prefers to make the final selection of their treatment after seriously considering their doctor's opinion.

Concepts.longName: Prefer to Make Final Selection of My Treatment After Seriously Considering My Doctor's Opinion
Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual prefers to make the final selection of their treatment after seriously considering their doctor's opinion.

PermissibleValues.value: I prefer to make the final selection about which treatment I will receive.
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Prefer to Make Final Selection About Which Treatment I Will Receive

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Prefer to Make Final Selection About Which Treatment I Will Receive
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual prefers to make the final selection about which treatment they will receive.

Concepts.longName: Prefer to Make Final Selection About Which Treatment I Will Receive
Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual prefers to make the final selection about which treatment they will receive.

ReferenceDocuments.name: The following statements desc
ReferenceDocuments.description: The following statements describe different ways to decide about choosing a treatment.  Which of the following best describes what you prefer?
